x = sqrt( 1 / sqrt(2))
y = sqrt ( sqrt(2))

Should geometric means, not arithmetic means.
C0 .92044820762685727151 1.30171033868790805775 wrong

geometric mean:  gm = xV(n1 * n2 * ... nx)

C0 .91700404320467123174 1.29683955465100966592


x = sqrt( sqrt(1/sqrt(2)))
y = sqrt( sqrt ( sqrt(2)) * sqrt(2))
